contentList.content: You have proficiency with artisan’s tools (tinker’s tools), When you create a device, choose one of the following options : Music Box, Shovel

You died, but it didn't stick. Now, you walk amongst the living once more as a creature reanimated by negative energy.

Your undead nature means many spells and effects interact with you differently, or not at all. You have Advantage on Death Saving Throws, and you are Immune to Disease and Poison, and are healed by Necrotic damage. Once per long rest, you immediately gain health when downed.
If you reach 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, you regain [1] instead of becoming <LSTag Tooltip="Downed">Downed</LSTag>. Refreshes after a long rest.
If you reach 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, you regain [1] instead of becoming <LSTag Tooltip="Downed">Downed</LSTag>. Once per short rest.

Your undeath has become a font of rejuvenation.

You are immune to Disease, and you have resistance to Cold damage and Necrotic damage. Your Undying Fervor feature now replenishes after a short rest.
